      • createPlaylist

        public boolean createPlaylist(java.lang.String playlistName,
                              User playlistUser)
        Create a private playlist in the MCS
        pre: Use "playlistName" as first parameter if you want to add a PrivatePlaylist
        post: Returns true if the playlist was created correctly, false if it doesn't
        Parameters:
        playlistName - String that indicates the name of the playlist.
        playlistUser - An user, it must be one from the playlistCollection of the MCS
        Returns:
        true or false

      • createPlaylist

                              java.lang.String playlistName)

        pre: Use "playlistUser" as first parameter if you want to add a RestrictedPlaylist
        post: Returns true if the playlist was created correctly, false if it doesn't
        Parameters:
        playlistUser - An user, it must be one from the playlistCollection of the MCS
        playlistName - String that indicates the name of the playlist.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • createSong

        public boolean createSong(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          java.lang.String authorName,
                          java.lang.String releaseDate,
                          int genre,
                          Duration songDuration)
        Create a song in the MCS
        pre:
        post: Returns true if the song was created correctly, false if it doesn't
        Parameters:
        name - String that indicates the name of the user that is going to add a song
        password - String that indicates the password of the already mentioned user
        title - String that indicates the title of the song that is going to be added
        authorName - String that indicates the name of the artist or band of the song
        releaseDate - String that indicates the release date of the song.releaseDate must be a date with a format DD/MM/YYYY
        genre - An int that indicates the genre of the song. 1 <= genre <= 6
        songDuration - A duration object that indicates the duration of the song
        Returns:
        true or false

      • findUser

        public int findUser(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Finds a user of the MCS
        pre: It is only useful if there is at least one user in the MCS.
        post: Returns an int, if it is "-1" then the user doesn't exist. If is another number, indicates the position in which the user is
        Parameters:
        name - String that indicates the name of the user
        password - String that indicates the password of the user
        Returns:
        index

      • findSong

        public int findSong(java.lang.String title)
        Finds a song of the MCS
        pre: It is only useful if there is at least one song in the MCS.
        post: Returns an int, if it is "-1" then the song doesn't exist. If is another number, indicates the position in which the song is
        Parameters:
        title - String that indicates the title of the song
        Returns:
        index

      • findPlaylist

        public int findPlaylist(java.lang.String playlistName)
        Finds a playlist of the MCS
        pre: It is only useful if there is at least one playlist in the MCS.
        post: Returns an int, if it is "-1" then the playlist doesn't exist. If is another number, indicates the position in which the playlist is
        Parameters:
        playlistName - String that indicates the name of the playlist
        Returns:
        index

      • playlistInstanceOf

        public int playlistInstanceOf(int index)
        Given an index, identify what type of playlist it is
        pre:
        post: Returns an int, if is 1 the playlist is a Private playlist, if is 2 the playlist is a restricted playlist, if is 3 the playlist is a public playlist
        Parameters:
        index - int that indicates what playlist do you want to know its type.
        Returns:
        1 or 2 or 3

      • castAndAddAUserToPlaylist

                                         User appUser)
        Given an index and a user, add that user to the playlist with that "index"
        pre:
        post: Returns true if the user was successfully added to playlist, false if not
        Parameters:
        index - int that indicates what playlist do you want to add a user.
        appUser - An user, it must be one from the playlistCollection of the MCS
        Returns:
        true or false

        pre:
        post: Returns true if the song was successfully added to playlist, false if not
        Parameters:
        index - int that indicates what playlist do you want to add a aong.
        appSong - A Song, it must be one from the poolSongs of the MCS
        Returns:
        true or false

      • giveARateToAPublicPlaylist

                                       double userRating)
        Given an index and a rating, add that song to the public playlist with that "index"
        pre:
        post: Returns true if the rating was successfully added to the public playlist, false if not
        Parameters:
        index - int that indicates what playlist do you want to add a rating.
        appSong - A double that indicates what rating does the user give to the playlist
